recipes.name: Pizza with tomato an olives
recipes.description: Pizza is an iconic Italian creation, loved worldwide for its simple yet irresistible appeal. At its core, it's a round, thin crust of dough, generously adorned with flavorful tomato sauce, melted cheese (usually mozzarella), and an array of toppings limited only by your imagination.

recipes.name: Paella
recipes.description: Paella is a vibrant and flavorful Spanish rice dish that originates from the Valencia region. It typically features saffron-infused rice cooked with a medley of ingredients such as succulent seafood, tender chicken or rabbit, assorted vegetables, and aromatic spices.

recipes.name: Steak
recipes.description: A steak dish is a carnivore's delight, showcasing a perfectly seared and juicy cut of beef, often seasoned with a simple blend of salt, pepper, and perhaps a hint of garlic or herbs.
